website_summaries.verdict: One of the deeper litter pans, and very portable for owners whose cats travel with them.
pros: On the smaller side, which some customers appreciate and some cats prefer
One of the more affordable litter pans available
High marks for odor prevention and ease of use for cats of all ages

customer_reviews.title: No more litter mess.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten thought her other box was not only a potty but sandbox to play in. I ended up with litter all over bathroom. This litter box definitely solved the problems with thrown litter. She likes it better than her old box. She seems to enjoy her privacy. If she wants to play, she jumps on and off hood. I would definitely recommend this litter box and would definitely purchase again. It is very well-made so it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cat box couldn't be a large.
customer_reviews.text: The item said large when on Amazon, when I got it, it is not a large and it is very cheaply made and there was no handle on the top like there was suppose to be, which was not even in the box if it broke off. Waste of money and had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Linda MC

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I AM USING THIS FOR A OUTDOOR CAT HOUSE FOR THE WINTER....VERY STURDY PRODUCT, I CUT A BACK DOOR OUT WITH NO PROBLEMS WITH CRACKS RUNNING UP THE SIDES AND HANG CUT PLASTIC STRIPS FOR DOORS AND FILLED IT WITH HAY.....covered the top vent with duct tape...I ALSO PUT IT 3-4 INCHES IN THE GROUND SO IT DOESN'T BLOW AWAY.....
customer_reviews.author: patty pattison

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I had three of these that I bought 10 years ago but one broke so I ordered another and the large is like a miniature version so I must have giant sizes or something, but only my 6 lb kitty feels comfortable in this, which I guess is good because my 17-lber has to use the other ones. Also, the plastic snaps break easily and the swing plastic odor trap can get stuck and trap the kitties inside so I remove mine.
customer_reviews.author: Instructor in Nevada

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: This one is replacing one that surved it's purpose. It was time for a new one. Pros.. I liked the cream color and that's what I bought. Cons..One of the locks to the lid does not fit. So I had to put my blue one back on this new one. Doesn't make me happy. I wanted to change the color for my new apt., in that particular bathroom. I did try to get it resolved, to no avail. That's how it goes sometimes, i suppose.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It fit the space perfectly. But when I got it, the handle on the top was missing. So I returned it. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerGirl

customer_reviews.title: The “locking” feature is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying the lock feature from the top pan to the bottom pan is absolutely trash. We bought one from walmart that was the same style. The one from walmart was cheaper, bigger, and the lock feature works much better. Would recommend a different one. However, i will say it does work as advertised all around. It does clean easily, and it helps keep the smell down a little from what we were used to. All around its just alright. Again, the locks suck.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Repeat Buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these right now, & when I need another one, I will buy it again! I mean, if you have to have something for your cats to pee & poop in...This is the one to do it with! Lol! They last too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bates

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is ok. It isn't as big as we thought it would be. We have a couple of big cats and they don't fit in it very well. It is a bit flimsy and you wouldn't carry it by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: SusieB

customer_reviews.title: Amazon did NOT send me the item featured in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Van Ness covered cat litter box. I received a blue Target brand box with a broken latch. The box I received is very cheaply made and flimsy. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock feature. It is not huge, which makes it perfect for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: PeriLynn H Glasner

customer_reviews.title: The side hinges DO NOT hook to the box.
customer_reviews.text: The hooks on the side DO NOT Stay hinged to the box. Very frustrating. You cannot pick it up from the handle on top of the box because it will come apart and make a BIG MESS!! You have to drag it to get it where you want it. Do not recommend and will not purchase again. The size of the box is good for a medium cat just wish the hinges would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A.

customer_reviews.title: Small Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the price and because the seller claimed it was a large litter box. This is not true. The litter box is perhaps the smallest I have ever seen. It is perfect for kittens nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a different litter box!!! Door kept falling off!! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Barges

customer_reviews.title: Dropshipped from Wal-Mart
customer_reviews.text: Box works great. Cat loves it. I was surprised that it arrived in a Walmart box shipped from there. Seems the item was drop shipped.
customer_reviews.author: lovelyshoes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my kitten. Both my cat and kitten prefer this box, and my cats box hasn't been touched in weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my cat other litter box didn't come with a lid. Now there's no mess all around the floor which is great and its very easy to clean. The only thing that I doesnt work is the door, Its broken.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Medina

customer_reviews.title: No more smell
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the smell in but my cat still drags litter out somehow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This litter box was awful. The lock did not work so every time you picked it up to clean the bottom would fall off. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box! Perfect size for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: I personally love it because it's small, but if you have a larger cat it might be Too small for her/him.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for my cat fits well in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: dalvina

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many litter boxes but no job like this ... my cat loves it and most importantly, there is no bad smell and there is no sand on the floor ... we are happy! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: LUCY M. MORLA

customer_reviews.title: Not as "large" as I imagined
customer_reviews.text: Decent size box, but not as big as other large litter boxes. Good for one cat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Litter box
customer_reviews.text: This litter box has kept the litter inside the box no matter how Happy my cat gets when using it even with the lid off. I don’t put the lid on because my cat has issues with using an enclosed litter box. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tania c.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but great for a single cat home. Keeps the dog out of the cat poop. Small, but still easily accommodates a small to medium sized house cat.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Royster

customer_reviews.title: Not practical for small cats or kittens
customer_reviews.text: Step-up too clumsy for my cat, so she avoided using it. Disappointed, however very good quality and cap locks tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rivard

customer_reviews.title: My kitty likes it and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My cat enjoys this litter box and I do find it easier to clean. I did end up taking the door off because he was nervous to use it. Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: it's the only litter box I use...eight cats and 50 years of felines
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean and my cats love it, if I remove the door flap.
customer_reviews.author: NancyLee Shanlin

customer_reviews.title: *very small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this thinking it was a larger litter box it's not, it is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Box is not very sturdy. Licks aren’t very good either. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Heimanson

customer_reviews.title: Large Van Ness Products Covered Cat Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: Covered and large Van Ness Products Cat Litter Box is purrfect way to keep room neater.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is AMAZING and I use it for my pet rabbit! Rabbits often love hidey-houses so this worked great, due to the roof feature. I also have been having a hard time finding a good size until I came across this magnificent item! Came much faster than expected and was very nicely packaged. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: prasad potipireddi

customer_reviews.title: Best for one cat.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than expected. The clear door falls off doesn't swing as it should. I bought for two cats, not big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harmon

customer_reviews.title: the in and out door easy to clean keep ordor in after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: the clip on broke off the door keeps coming off. not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wanda wilson

customer_reviews.title: Handsomely Hooded & Perfectly Placed
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s nestled right under my bathroom sink. There is a pipe right in the middle which prevents me from fitting most hooded boxes here. I love the form and fit. I was concerned with white, but it is a warm warm and beautiful for the space.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in NY

product_meta.title: Van Ness Products Covered Cat Litter Box- Large (Large)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
